title: Purchasing & Logistics Coordinator | Leyte, PH-Based Preferred
job_overview:
JOB TITLE: Purchasing & Logistics Coordinator
LOCATION: WFH | Leyte-based applicants will be prioritized.
TYPE: Full-time | 40 hours per week


ABOUT US
The Metal Company is a family business in New Zealand. We supply stainless steel products to companies like wineries and food producers. Our team is known for fast service and helpful support.

We are hiring a Purchasing & Logistics Coordinator to help with supplier coordination, shipping updates, and data entry.

YOUR TASKS
-Contact factories to check on orders
-Help book and track international shipments
-Organize and send documents
-Enter simple data into our system
-Send documents to customers
-Help with payments and delivery updates
-Support the team with small admin tasks

WHAT WE NEED
-Good English (writing and speaking)
-Careful with details and good at following up
-Knows how to use Excel or Google Sheets
-Can work during New Zealand/Australian business hours
-Honest, reliable, and easy to work with

NICE TO HAVE
-Experience in admin, purchasing, or shipping
-Worked with international suppliers or companies

WHY JOIN US?
-Fully work-from-home
-Friendly and supportive team
-Stable, long-term work (paid in USD)
-Opportunity to grow with the company

HOW TO APPLY
-Please use your location as the subject title when applying, ex. Leyte Applicant/ Manila Applicant etc.
-Please apply directly on this job post with your resume and a short message telling us why you are the right fit for the role.
- Applications sent to email or outside the job post link will not be considered.
